CustomField.formula: or(isBLANK(Account_Number__c),isblank( Application__c), isblank( TEXT(Customer_LE_Type__c) ), isblank( Customer_Name__c), isblank( TExt(Customer_Type__c) ), isblank( Distribution_Channel__c), isblank( text(Dll_Country__c)), isblank(text(Geography__c)), isblank( Lease_Signer_First_Name__c), isblank( Lease_Signer_Last_Name__c), isblank( Lease_Signer_Title__c), isblank( NAICS__c), isblank( Source_System__c), isblank( Transaction_Amount__c ), isblank( TEXT(Product_Risk__c) ))
CustomField.label: Missing Data
